comment: Class code at the beginning is incorrect. I took INED 7742 with Mr. Harper during my first semester in grad school.  He is very approachable.  He gives timely, meaningful feedback.  He always says that he's there to help and I do believe it is sincere.
rating_tags: Clear grading criteria--Gives good feedback--Accessible outside class

comment: He is super understanding. He is willing to give you plenty of extra time to get your assignments in. There is quite a bit of work for this course, but he is an easy grader.

LOVED HIM!! lots of work but manageable, I ended with a 99. for INED 3304 I would take him over any other professors. such a sweet guy and is always quick to respond to emails and when I needed help with the assignments. you will not regret taking him!
